unnormalised: Hey, interesting piece on training regimens! Reminds me of Dr. Sharma's coaching at NIS Patiala. Remember how hard Rohan trained for the 100m? He'd run like 10 km every morning! Discipline like that is key. Heard that new badminton academy has a 2000 sq ft gym. Rs. 5 Lakhs initial investment, wow! Seems legit. What do you guys think of yoga for recovery, post-training? Namaste!
normalised: Hey, interesting piece on training regimens! Reminds me of Doctor Sharma's coaching at N I S Patiala. Remember how hard Rohan trained for the one hundred meter? He'd run like ten kilometer every morning! Discipline like that is key. Heard that new badminton academy has a two thousand square feet gym. Rupee five lakh initial investment, wow! Seems legit. What do you guys think of yoga for recovery, post-training? Namaste!
